messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Is there still a Laura Ashley store somewhere out there?
messages.msgSnippet: There is a Laura Ashley store in Princeton, NJ.  I know that doesn t help you, but as far as I know, they are still in business. Bonnie ...
messages.messageBody:
There is a Laura Ashley store in Princeton, NJ. I know that doesn't help
you, but as far as I know, they are still in business.

Bonnie


>From: Sonia Ulan <sulan@...>
>Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
>To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
>Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Is there still a Laura Ashley store somewhere
>out there?
>Date: Wed, 12 Jul 2000 01:41:50 -0600
>
>
>I need some help please!
>
>This is totally a non-unschooling topic. But I was wondering if anyone
>knows if the store Laura Ashley is still in business? We used to have a
>few in Canada and I've just found out they have all closed. I'm
>surprised and devastated. I've never been able to do a lot of shopping
>there but when appropriate, I did hit sales at stores in other
>provinces. (There's never been one in Saskatchewan)
>I cannot access them at all via the internet either so if anyone can
>help-out here I'd be much obliged. I'd hate to think they've gone out
>of business. Do I need a trip to Great Britain to find one?
>
>Thanks for any and all help,
>
>Sonia

________________________________________________________________________

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Is there still a Laura Ashley store somewhere out there?
messages.msgSnippet: There are Laura Ashley stores in Boston.-- at least there were a year ago when I was looking for flower girl dresses.-- Funny, I had tried to find them on the
messages.messageBody:
There are Laura Ashley stores in Boston.-- at least there were a year ago
when I was looking for flower girl dresses.-- Funny, I had tried to find
them on the internet too and whenI asked why I couln't, those at the store
told me they were working on it.... Try Boston Directory assistance

hope this helps --Amy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Laura Ashley stores
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hi Sonia, I went to the Laura Ashley website at http://www.laura-ashley.com/ If you follow the links, you will get to a page that tells you where all the
messages.messageBody:
At 01:41 AM 7/12/00 -0600, you wrote:
>
>I need some help please!
>
>This is totally a non-unschooling topic. But I was wondering if anyone
>knows if the store Laura Ashley is still in business? We used to have a
>few in Canada and I've just found out they have all closed.

Hi Sonia,

I went to the Laura Ashley website at

http://www.laura-ashley.com/

If you follow the links, you will get to a page that tells you where all
the stores are located. I clicked on North America and it looks as though
there are only 6 listed. Now I don't know how recent this map is, but once
you get to the website, surely you should be able to get more information.

Hope this helps,
Patti


>
I just got lost in thought. It was unfamiliar territory.

Wardfamily7@...

messages.subject: Is there still a Laura Ashley store somewhere out there?
messages.msgSnippet: I need some help please! This is totally a non-unschooling topic.  But I was wondering if anyone knows if the store Laura Ashley is still in business?  We used
messages.messageBody:
I need some help please!

This is totally a non-unschooling topic. But I was wondering if anyone
knows if the store Laura Ashley is still in business? We used to have a
few in Canada and I've just found out they have all closed. I'm
surprised and devastated. I've never been able to do a lot of shopping
there but when appropriate, I did hit sales at stores in other
provinces. (There's never been one in Saskatchewan)
I cannot access them at all via the internet either so if anyone can
help-out here I'd be much obliged. I'd hate to think they've gone out
of business. Do I need a trip to Great Britain to find one?

Thanks for any and all help,

Sonia
